  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x108
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x108
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x0
      LayoutBlockFlow (floating) {DIV} at (-4216,0) size 5000x100 [bgcolor=#66EEAA]
        LayoutText {#text} at (4707,0) size 293x18
